pages.text: $(li)The Blaze Powder is an item used that can be used as fuel in the $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/strength)Potion of Strength$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l)$(/l) too.

$(li)Finally, the Blaze Powder can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/fire_charge)Fire Charge$(/l), $(l:patchouli:decoration/charm/lantern_blocks)Blaze Lantern$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/magma_cream)Magma Creams$(/l), $(l:patchouli:decoration/charm/lanterns)Copper Lanterns$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/eye_of_ender)Eyes of Ender$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
